profile:
Welcome to Floor Coverings International Moncton! We are the premier flooring company serving the greater Moncton, Dieppe, Riverview area. We provide high quality design and installation services and carry the latest flooring products including hardwood, carpet, stone, laminate, and tile flooring! Take the guesswork out of getting new floors and schedule your free in-home consultation today!

Michel Melanson
products: Harwood (including engineered), Carpet, Laminate, Luxury vinyl tile, Porcelain and Ceramic Tile
services: We bring our 3000 samples to your home in our mobile showroom and provide a custom solution to your flooring project. We can provide a turnkey services (move the furniture, remove existing products, repair sub-floor, install new products, install baseboards and replace furniture) or just sell you our quality products. We provide a free estimate.
brands:
Armstrong Luxury Vinyl Tile
Armstrong Resilient
Armstrong and Bruce Hardwood and laminates
Shaw carpets
Lauzon engineered hardwood
Twelve Oaks Laminates and engineered Hardwood
Daltile tiles
CITAK Area rugs
specialities: We bring the flooring store to your home!
warranty_terms: 2 Year on labour, 30+ year on product. Kindly ask for more details.
